markdown:
**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 165 1.1 **Price** 6,500 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 --- This staff was created as an example of the [personal staves rules](/Rules.aspx?ID=1499). Moss and winding vines give this gnarled staff of wild wood a vibrant green tinge. You created this staff to aid you in speaking to the plants you met on your adventure and beseeching them to come to your aid.
  • **Cantrip** [_tanglefoot_](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
  • **1st** [protector tree](/Spells.aspx?ID=976), [_shillelagh_](/Spells.aspx?ID=282)
  • **2nd** [_entangle_](/Spells.aspx?ID=103), [_shape wood_](/Spells.aspx?ID=277)
  • **3rd** [_tree shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=342), [_wall of thorns_](/Spells.aspx?ID=366)
  • **4th** [_barkskin_](/Spells.aspx?ID=20), [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=294)
  • **5th** [_plant form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=223), _wall of thorns_
  • **6th** [_nature's reprisal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=954), _plant form_
**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
name: Lini's Leafstick
